== SDL ==

Téléchargez la version de SDL spécialement compilé pour Mingw.
(SDL-devel-1.2.14-mingw32.tar.gz)

  # Comme pour toutes installation de SDL, copier bin\SDL.dll vers C:\WINDOWS ou le dossier de l'éxecutable (DEBUG ou RELEASE)
  # Copier le contenu de SDL-version\lib (libSDL.dll.a, libSDL.la, libSDLmain.a) vers C:\MinGW\lib
  # Copier le contenu de SDL-version\include (copier le dossier SDL) vers C:\MinGW\include\
  # Ajouter C:\MinGW\bin à la variable système PATH et restart pc

----
= Partie Eclipse =

Dans les propriétés du projet

C/C++ Build > settings > GCC C++ Compiler:

Preprocessor > Defined symbols (-D)
  * main=SDL_main
Includes > Include paths (-I)
  * "C:\MinGW\lib\gcc\mingw32\4.6.1\include\c++"
  * "C:\MinGW\lib"
  * "C:\MinGW\lib\gcc\mingw32\4.6.1\include\c++\backward"
  * "C:\MinGW\lib\gcc\mingw32\4.6.1\include"
  * "C:\MinGW\lib\gcc\mingw32\4.6.1\include\c++\mingw32"
  * "C:\MinGW\lib\gcc\mingw32\4.6.1\include-fixed"
  * "C:\MinGW\include"

MinGW C++ Linker > Libraries
add the folowing libraries (Libraries -l)
  * mingw32
    * SDL_ttf
    * SDL_image
    * (même chose pour les autres extensions SDL)
  * SDLmain
  * SDL

MinGW C++ Linker > Miscellaneous
Linker flags: -mwindows

== FreeType2 ==

  # Unzip wherever you want (not in the project workspace)
  # Compile the lib with MinGW (you can import the MS visual C++ or visual studio project in code::block, link the right directories and it does it all for you)
  # Copy/paste the content of the include folder in the Include folder of MinGW directory
  # Copy the lib that you've just compiled and paste it in the lib folder of the MinGW
  # Add the linker flag: "libfreetype" (or the name of the lib you've got)

== FTGL ==

*It needs a working copy of FreeType2, so you need to compile FreeType2 first*

  # Unzip wherever you want (not in the project workspace)
  # Compile the lib with MinGW (you can import the MS visual C++ or visual studio project in code::block, link the right directories and it does it all for you)
  # Copy/paste the FTGL folder in the Include folder of MinGW
  # Copy the lib that you've just compiled and paste it in the lib folder of the MinGW
  # Add the linker flag: "libftgl" (or the name of the lib you've got)

----
= Project's Specific Settings =

Chaque sous-dossier du dossier "src" doivent être inclus des les Include du GCC C++ Compiler settings.

Donc, jusqu'à maintenant:
  * TileEngine
  * TileEngine/Graphics
  * Util

Pas besoin d'ajouter le dossier de jeu puisqu'il est considéré par défaut comme le dossier de développement. Par contre, les sous-dossier de GetRandomGame devront être ajouté dans les Include.

== Linker flags ==

You should have something like that:
{{{
-lmingw32 -lSDLmain -lSDL -lSDL_image -lSDL_net -lSDL_ttf -llibftgl -llibfreetype -lopengl32 -lglu32
}}}

The names may change but <font color="red">*the order shouldn't be change*</font>!
